sense.name: make a certain size or sort according to size
sense.examples: He sized the boa from head to tail. The contractor sized the pipes large to counteract blockage. Mary sized the ring to fit her index finger. He sized the water heaters with 75-gallon storage tanks.

sense.name: SIZE UP: look at critically or in minute detail
sense.examples: It's as if he sized the tomatoes and corn up, sized the farmer up and decided that 10 dollars was appropriate. Have you sized up the competition?

sense.name: glaze a porous material with a glutinous substance
sense.examples: The potter sized the equipment properly for the heating load.
